analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ZEONPrivateSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/18/0x2671500a8a6d099ae8743ad3ff848a6636fe9a75.sol#569-586):
	External calls:
	- referral = investorWhiteList.getReferralOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/18/0x2671500a8a6d099ae8743ad3ff848a6636fe9a75.sol#576-580)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/18/0x2671500a8a6d099ae8743ad3ff848a6636fe9a75.sol)

ZEONPrivateSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/18/0x2671500a8a6d099ae8743ad3ff848a6636fe9a75.sol#531-535) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/18/0x2671500a8a6d099ae8743ad3ff848a6636fe9a75.sol#534-535)

ZEONPrivateSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/18/0x2671500a8a6d099ae8743ad3ff848a6636fe9a75.sol#569-586) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0x2671500a8a6d099ae8743ad3ff848a6636fe9a75.sol)
	-token.transfer(referral,referralBonus) (/unique_chucks/18/0x2671500a8a6d099ae8743ad3ff848a6636fe9a75.sol)

Reentrancy in ZEONPrivateSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/18/0x2671500a8a6d099ae8743ad3ff848a6636fe9a75.sol#569-586):
	External calls:
	- referral = investorWhiteList.getReferralOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/18/0x2671500a8a6d099ae8743ad3ff848a6636fe9a75.sol#576-580)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collected (/unique_chucks/18/0x2671500a8a6d099ae8743ad3ff848a6636fe9a75.sol)
	- deposited (/unique_chucks/18/0x2671500a8a6d099ae8743ad3ff848a6636fe9a75.sol)
